channel.title: Teachings on David García Callejas
channel.description: Recent content in Teachings on David García Callejas

item.description: Research · Publications and CV · Teaching · Blog Here you can find some teaching materials for different courses and seminars I have taught over the years: Advanced Statistical techniques for Conservation and Biodiversity (UHU 2020/2021, in spanish) Materials Conservation Biology (UAB 2017, in spanish) Seminar 1 - General ideas and trends on Conservation Biology Seminar 2 - Drivers: Climate change, habitat loss and fragmentation Seminar 3 - Invasive species (with Yolanda Melero) Seminar 4 - Land Stewardship (with Alberto Navarro) Forest Ecology (UAB 2017, in spanish)
